Text.Page:
We need to clean up some of the trash the argons left behind.

Specifically, {@LinkCreature:47#4002#argonomorph naga wyrmlings}, {@LinkCreature:47#1002#argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies}, and {@LinkCreature:47#4003#argonomorph gula smashers} are making it hard to get from one place to another on the {@Rgn:47005$$Argon Frontier}.

Thin them out for us, will you?

I hope you haven't forgotten about hunting those {@LinkCreature:47#4002#argonomorph naga wyrmlings}, {@LinkCreature:47#1002#argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies}, and {@LinkCreature:47#4003#argonomorph gula smashers}. We need them gone.
